item.title: Cisco ACI Terraform Policy Model
item.description: The big picture This blog post is a memo for the ACI Terraform policy model. I have struggled to find equivalences between ACI REST API Call / Classes and Terraform resources. Below you can find the full diagram. The diagram is not exhaustive but I think I have reached a point where I can published something. I will probably modify or add things if I use more resources or if people correct me but I think it is a good start.
